titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 558) to grant the consent of the Congress to the Texas Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 558 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. During consideration of the bill for amendment, the Chairman may accord priority in recognition to those Members who have had their amendments printed in the Record.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-426, by Mr. McInnis.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 167.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/19/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for the consideration of H.R. 558 (Texas Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact).
